column2: "Didn't I make myself clear? Everything you need to know is right there on the request."
"Should I make it easy for you to understand? Just kill all of the Darkers that you can."
"Go kill as many Dagans as you can."
"No one is forcing you to do this."
"However, if you take this on, I want you to exterminate every last one of those abominations that you encounter."
